What i individually thought,From this movie  is if A Priest loved & had phisical with A Girl by her consent and Girl too loved him then it should be ok but it should only be seen as crime in case as later he killed her & litteraly used her.

We have  to seperate our vision for love & Crime.

ts often been seen in Our Nation that every thing is seen by relegious perspective but we have to identify what is right & what wrong is, irrespective of Relegious vision by respecting all the relegions.

And apart it,love shouldn't be made limited by any limitation on any ground.
